name: Learn GRE Vocabulary
description: Expand your GRE vocabulary effortlessly with our Firefox add-on, designed to enhance your browsing experience. With each new tab you open, our add-on brings you a handpicked selection of GRE words along with their meanings, allowing you to learn and reinforce your word power seamlessly. Whether you're a student preparing for the GRE or simply interested in enhancing your language skills, our add-on turns every tab into a learning opportunity. Start each browsing session with a dose of knowledge and elevate your vocabulary with ease.
